sentence.Network_en: Titanium in the pure state can exist in either of two allotropic forms.

sentence.Network_en: Carbon and sulfur and phosphorus are allotropic elements.

sentence.Network_en: Ozone ( O 3 ) is allotropic form of oxygen ( O 2 ) with three atoms in each molecule.
sentence.Network_cn: 氧气和臭氧都是由 氧 原子组成.
